content: same stitch as join o * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 in next stitch o repeat from * around join with a slipstitch in 3rd chain of beginning chain 4 fasten_off button band and neck cid 1 round 1 with wrong side facing join yarn in bottom corner of left front o chain 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and each stitch up left front with half_double_crochet ch1 half_double_crochet in center corner stitch - around neck to right front corner o work corner *half_double_crochet in next 2 stitches chain 3 skip 3 single_crochet* repeat from * to * twice more total of 3 buttonholes o half_double_crochet to end of row do not half_double_crochet in side of ruffle chain 1 turn cid 1 round 2 single_crochet in each stitch around working 3 single_crochet in each ch3 space and single_crochet ch1 single_crochet in each corner fasten_off weave in ends sew on buttons enjoy stitch guide cid 1 single_crochet 2 together - decrease worked over 2 stitches insert hook in next stitch yarn over and pull up loop 2 loops on hook insert hook in next stitch yarn over and pull up loop 3 loops on hook yarn over and draw through all 3 loops this counts as 1 single_crochet cid 1 front post half_double_crochet fphdc - yarn over insert hook from front to back to front around post of stitch in row below yarn over and draw up a loop yarn over and draw through all 3 loops cid 1 back post half_double_crochet bphdc yarn over insert hook from back to front to back around post of stitch in row below yarn over and draw up a loop yarn over and draw through all 3 loops
